TopicTitle: SpaceUP San Diego just started this (Superbowl?) weekend - live webcast

Articles.Content:
For those interested in human space efforts, SpaceUP the 'space un-conference' just started this weekend in San Diego, California, USA. (GMT - 8 hours). They say they will have webcasting, and quite a few commercial space companies will be represented.

No-one there is wearing a Kerbal costume AFAIK. Someone should make one for kids.

Webcast link: http://spaceup.org/sandiego/2012/02/webcasting-and-swag/ and if you hunt around there will be an agenda somewhere too.
